entries.name: Attuned wisdom
entries.properties:
Automatically gained when WIS >= 5
Add 3 skill points among any skills.

entries.name: Half run
entries.properties: May move 20 feet on level ground and 10 feet on difficult terrain.

entries.name: Dimvision
entries.properties: See into dim light as if it were day.

entries.name: Song of the weave
entries.properties:
At the start of the next turn, you begin a song. A song can last for as long as it is played or sung. The song can be accompanied with a Motif and is set to a abilityTime signature.
The song is played with one beat equaling one turn. A beat is an ability that can only be performed during a song. Beats have one of four types:
  • Sharp
  • Flat
  • Natural
  • Rest
Beats are played in a Measure, depending on the abilityTime signature. Certain beats can only be played if they follow a particular beat type, or fall at a particular point in the measure.
A measure is a pattern of a particular number of beats, determined by the chosen abilityTime signature for the song. For example, if a 4/4 measure is chosen, every four beats the measure starts over. The song needs to be carefully considered to ensure it maintains proper rhythm and theme. Playing the right beats in sequence can provide bonuses. If a beat is not played on a turn, the turn is considered a Rest. If two rests are played in sequence, the song is ended early.
If a song is ended early, you must use abilityTemperament to begin the next song. Certain Composition dynamics like abilityOutro can end a song properly instead of early. If a song is ended properly, the next song can begin by using this ability.

entries.name: Time signature
entries.properties:
The time signature determines how many beats are in a measure. A measure starts over after the last beat in the measure. Certain time signatures are gained at certain levels:
  • At level 1 gain the 4/4 measure: 4 beats per measure
  • At level 1 gain the 4/4 measure: 4 beats per measure
  • At level 4 gain the 3/4 measure: 3 beats per measure
  • At level 10 gain the 2/4 measure: 2 beats per measure
  • At level 14 gain the 6/8 measure: 6 beats per measure
Once a time signature is chosen for the song, it cannot be changed.

entries.name: Temperament
entries.properties: Take two whole turns preparing for the next song by retuning your instrument or relaxing your vocal chords. After Temperament, abilitySong of the weave can be performed again. Temperament is only performed when required (see abilitySong of the weave for more details).

entries.name: Outro
entries.properties: Can only be activated during the last beat of the measure.  If activated, the next measure will be the last measure of the song, and the song will end properly.

entries.name: Capriccio
entries.properties:
A quick, improvisational, spirited composition.
All allies within the song's range gain abilityExtra move. Any ally that already has abilityExtra move gains abilityExtra move II instead. All allies also gain +2 to skillAthletic checks.

entries.name: Accompaniment
entries.properties: +2 to DMG or healing to beats if playing a two-handed instrument during a song.

entries.name: Grazioso
entries.properties:
A gracefully composition.
All allies within the song's range gain +1 AR. All allies also gain +2 to skillBalance checks.

entries.name: Soundwave
entries.properties:
+1 AR for every preceding beat in the measure.
+2 DMG if following a Rest.

entries.name: Healing words
entries.properties: +3 healing if the 3rd beat in the measure.
